caption.p: Histological evaluation of paw tissue after cashew nuts treatment following CAR-injection. Investigation of tissue injury of the animals subjected to CAR, was made by H/E staining. CAR group shows a loss of the physiological architecture compared to sham. Cashew nuts administered 30 min before CAR-injection shows reduction in infiltrating cells and edema formation compared to vehicle. Histological score ( D). See materials and methods for further details. Sham ( A, A1); CAR ( B, B1); cashew nuts ( C, C1). *** p < 0.001 vs. sham.
